name: 白姝玉
objective: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解電信網路之基本概念、各種設備、及技術標準，以作為學生畢業後從事電信相關行業之基礎知識，也可以作為學生繼續修習通訊相關課程之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)電信簡介 (2)數位傳輸技術 (3)數位交換系統 (4) 信號系統 (5)市話與長途網路 (6)光纖通訊系統 (7) 衛星通訊(optional) (8)行動通訊。
schedule:
W1-2 Telecommunication overview
W3 Signals & dB and its application
W4 Quality of service
W5-6 Transmission and switching
W7-8 Digital network
W9 Midterm exam
W10-11 Signaling
W12 Local and long-distance network
W13 Fiber-optic communication
W14 Satellite communication (optional)
W15-17 Wireless mobile communication
W18 Final exam
scorePolicy:
Midterm & Final exam 65%
Pop quiz (open book) 25%
Class participation 10%
materials:
Class handout.
Reference: Freeman, Fundamentals of Telecommunications, 2nd ed., Wilney, New York 2005,
